title: Episode 64: Jack Flaherty and Lil Yachty
description:
On today’s episode of the Old Man and the Three, it’s an epic crossover as JJ and Tommy welcome in two stars to the show. Leading off is St Louis Cardinals’ standout pitcher Jack Flaherty. He digs in on many topics, including the current state of MLB, the issues surrounding the substance checks on pitchers, baseball fashion, whether or not JJ can hit 80 mph on a radar gun, and much more. Then the show flips on its side as Lil Yachty jumps in for a can’t miss deep dive on the movie Interstellar, athletes who dabble in music, and JJ’s rapping career.
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
